name: Hampton Roads Helicopters, Inc
about: Hampton Roads Helicopters, Inc., established in 2005, is a comprehensive aviation company based at Hampton Roads Executive Airport. We offer world-class flight and ground school training, helicopter charter services, aerial photography and videography, aerial tours, and special event support. As an authorized Robinson Helicopters Dealer and Service Center, we specialize in operating and maintaining Robinson helicopters, as well as providing services for fixed-wing aircraft. Our highly qualified instructors provide training for various certifications, including Airline Transport Pilot, Commercial, and Flight Instructor. We serve the Virginia Tidewater area and extend our services nationally and internationally. With a focus on excellence and safety, Hampton Roads Helicopters is dedicated to providing top-notch aviation services and training.
